title: E 'Flashback' when Yawning
author: Kaia
citation: Kaia. "E 'Flashback' when Yawning: experience with Ecstasy (ID 3090)". Erowid.org. Oct 5, 2000. erowid.org/exp/3090
report: I've rolled twice, once at Burningman 1999, once at BM 2000. For a while after the both times, I noticed that whenever I yawned, I'd feel E-like as the yawn finished.
